history.proof: intros x Hx. scongruence use: Rplus_comm, Rplus_min_distr_l unfold: Rmin.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros x Hx. destruct (nfloor_ex x) as [n [Hn1 Hn2]]. - apply Rle_trans with (r2:=0). + apply Rle_refl. + apply Rlt_le. auto. - exists n. split. + apply Rlt_le_trans with (r2:=INR n). * apply INR_lt. auto. * auto. + auto.
